io.spine.server.storage

Class AbstractStorage<I,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends ReadRequest<I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.AbstractStorage<I,M,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of storage records
    M - the type of records kept in the storage
    R - the type of read requests for the storage
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<I,M,R>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateStorage, InMemoryCatchUpStorage, InMemoryInboxStorage, RecordStorage

    public abstract class AbstractStorage<I,M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,R extends ReadRequest<I>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storage<I,M,R>
    Abstract base for storages.

    A storage can read and write messages of the given type.

      • checkNotClosed

        protected void checkNotClosed(java.lang.String message)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Ensures the storage is not closed.

        If the storage is closed, throws IllegalStateException with the passed message.

        Parameters:
        message - exception message
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the storage is closed
